Name: Chocolate Vodkatini
Ingredients: 30 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of sugar syrup and chocolate powder rim.
Review: Vodka and chocolate made more interesting with a hint of vermouth.
History: Martini cocktail  history and its evolution
Nutrition: One serving of Chocolate Vodkatini contains 218 calories
